title: ［重新開po附有新相］醫生證實有手足比狗打到顱內出血

replies.msg:
有醫生聯絡本頻道，披露警方濫暴情況。他透露，有一位青年示威者遭警方以警棍毆打頭部，導致顱內出血，血塊佔腦部相當大面積，需要立即進行手術取出血塊。該醫生指出，警察拖延傷者送院，由被打至送院足足延遲逾6小時，若再耽誤傷者恐變成植物人，甚至可能死亡。傷者現時於屯門醫院深切治療部留醫，仍未完全清醒。

該醫生進一步表示，即使是殺人犯，面對的處罰亦只是收監，「究竟呢個青年做咗啲乜要受咁嘅對待？當社會大眾譴責示威者破壞港鐵措施，又有幾多人會譴責警方使用嘅過分武力？講緊係蓄意令人受傷甚至死亡嘅武力。」 他呼籲警方不要再對任何人的頭部使用警棍及其他武力。

圖為該醫生參照傷者傷勢製作的X光片示意圖，紅圈為血塊。

（轉載請註明出處：反送中已核實資訊頻道@https://t.me/antiextraditionverifiednews）



***以下係最新update***
再有一名醫護人員聯絡本頻道，提供一張上述傷者的 真實 腦部電腦掃描。該醫護表示，看到網上對示意圖的真偽有懷疑，提供資料是希望䆁除大眾疑慮，並要讓大家認清警察濫暴的事實，「唔希望畀人當咗係fake news」。

當社會大眾譴責示威者破壞港鐵措施，又有幾多人會譴責警方使用嘅過分武力？

講得好岩
最低武力 都扑到人 重傷瞓醫院

攝多張 唔信上面嘅圖
起碼有其他當時人嘅圖

replies.msg:
by @食自助餐同飲咖啡
A doctor contacted this channel to disclose the police violence. He revealed that a young demonstrator was beaten by the police with a baton, causing intracranial hemorrhage. The blood clots accounted for a considerable area of ​​the brain and needed immediate surgery to remove blood clots. The doctor pointed out that the police delayed the injured to be sent to the hospital and was delayed from being sent to the hospital for more than 6 hours. If the injured person became a vegetative person, it might even die. The injured are currently in the intensive care unit of Tuen Mun Hospital and are still not fully awake.

The doctor further stated that even if it is a murderer, the punishment is only to accept the prisoner. "Which young people are going to be treated generously? When the public condemns the protesters to destroy the MTR measures, how many people will condemn The police used excessive force to talk about the deliberate injury or even death." He called on the police not to use batons and other force against anyone's head.

The picture shows a schematic diagram of the X-ray film made by the doctor with reference to the injured person's injury.
Brain CT was leaked. The red circle is a blood clot.

(Reprinted please indicate the source: Reversed the verified information channel @https://t.me/antiextraditionverifiednews)
